content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. I am looking to rent it out for a high price, so I'm open to hearing your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is great. However, I am a student and I can't afford to pay a high price. I am willing to pay 400 Euros per month plus utilities. I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but 400 Euros per month plus utilities is too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price to compensate for the prime location and the convenience of the facilities nearby. I hope you understand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is great, but as a student, I can't afford a high price. I can pay 450 Euros per month plus utilities. This is my final offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but 450 Euros per month plus utilities is still too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price to compensate for the prime location and the convenience of the facilities nearby. I hope you understand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is great, but as a student, I can't afford a high price. I can pay 500 Euros per month plus utilities. This is my final offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer once more, and I accept your final offer of 500 Euros per month plus utilities. I agree to the price of 500 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for accepting my offer. I am very pleased with the price we agreed upon. I look forward to signing the lease agreement. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we sign the lease agreement?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for agreeing to the price. I am glad we could come to an agreement. There is nothing else to discuss before signing the lease agreement. Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great. I will prepare the lease agreement for you. Please let me know if you have any questions about the agreement. I will also need a deposit of one month's rent, which in this case would be 500 Euros. I will provide you with all the necessary documents for the deposit.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for providing the details about the lease agreement and the deposit. I understand that you require a deposit of one month's rent, which is 500 Euros. I will provide the deposit and sign the lease agreement. If there are no further issues, we can proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Abbasi. I will prepare the lease agreement and provide it to you. Once you have signed the lease agreement and provided the deposit, we can proceed with renting the apartment to you. If there are no further issues, let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
